Sentencas: Flat-chip solid oxide fuel cell (FCSOFC) shows advantages for its improved tolerance towards fast start-up and thermal shock.
Titulo: Understanding performance difference in the scale-up of flat-chip solid oxide fuel cell: An experimental and numerical study

Sentencas: However, the performance of the stack is inferior to that of a single cell, and the reason for this discrepancy remains uncertain.
Titulo: Understanding performance difference in the scale-up of flat-chip solid oxide fuel cell: An experimental and numerical study

Sentencas: In this study, three-dimensional models are developed combing electrochemical reactions with momentum, mass, and heat transport to characterize the physical state distributions of both single cell and stack.
Titulo: Understanding performance difference in the scale-up of flat-chip solid oxide fuel cell: An experimental and numerical study

Sentencas: To validate the models, experimental data on electrical performance, temperature profile, and pressure drop are measured and compared, showing good agreement on both scales.
Titulo: Understanding performance difference in the scale-up of flat-chip solid oxide fuel cell: An experimental and numerical study

Sentencas: Multi-scale analysis reveals that the temperature distribution is the primary factor affecting stack performance in the scale-up of FCSOFC, with a large portion of reaction regions failing to reach the desired operating temperature.
Titulo: Understanding performance difference in the scale-up of flat-chip solid oxide fuel cell: An experimental and numerical study

Sentencas: A case study is conducted to investigate the influences of elevating the heating temperature and widening the cell spacing on temperature distribution and, consequently, stack performance.
Titulo: Understanding performance difference in the scale-up of flat-chip solid oxide fuel cell: An experimental and numerical study

Sentencas: Both measures effectively improve the unit cells' heating, resulting in stack performance enhancements of 27.0% and 21.5%, respectively.
Titulo: Understanding performance difference in the scale-up of flat-chip solid oxide fuel cell: An experimental and numerical study

Sentencas: These findings suggest that an in-depth investigation into the mechanism underlying the scale-up performance difference of FCSOFC contributes to improving its reliability and competitiveness.
Titulo: Understanding performance difference in the scale-up of flat-chip solid oxide fuel cell: An experimental and numerical study
